# Summary: logger.ts

## File Type
.ts - TypeScript source file

## Purpose
Purpose not explicitly documented

## Key Components

### Functions (3)
- **logRequest**: Log request data to file (only when LOGGING_ENABLED is true)
- **logDebug**: Log debug information (only when DEBUG_ENABLED is true)
- **logWarn**: Log warning (always enabled for important issues)




## Dependencies
- node:fs
- node:path
- node:os
- ./constants.js

## Exports
- LOGGING_ENABLED
- DEBUG_ENABLED
- logRequest
- logDebug
- logWarn
